title: Tyler Cameron says he has 'a lot of respect' for his former flame Gigi Hadid after their romance
text:
Tyler Cameron is opening about his relationship with supermodel, Gigi Hadid.

The Bachelorette star and the Vogue model dated briefly over the summer.

'Just meeting someone that was great. She's a great person, and I met a great friend,' he said during an interview with People TV's Reality Check. 'She's someone that I have a lot of respect for and think highly of, so I met a great person.'

Opening up: The Bachelorette's Tyler Cameron is opening about his relationship with supermodel, Gigi Hadid after their relationship recently fizzled out

But while the former 26-year-old reality star usually keeps his lips sealed about this subject, it seemed as though he had a bit more to say.

'I took it as I met a great person, a great friend. It wasn't like a bad breakup or anything like that,' he revealed.

'It was just, we're at different parts of our lives right now.'

'We're just friends,' he said of the 24-year-old cover girl.

Date night: Gigi and Tyler stepped out in SoHo while on a group date back in August

The two started dating back in July after they were spotted together at the SoHo House in Brooklyn back in August.

Then, just a few weeks later they were spotted driving around the Big Apple together as Tyler took a cat nap.

But that wasn't all, the Hollywood A-lister also brought her former beau to the Republic Records party at The Fleur Room after the MTV Video Music Awards.

Spotted: Gigi and Tyler are seen leaving Le Turtle in Manhattan with a couple of friends back on August 13

Things seemed to go downhill quickly after Hadid's grandmother passed away in September.

Cameron was there to comfort her and even attended the funeral with the family.

But shortly after, the relationship fizzled out and that was the final time they were spotted out together.

He also spent some time this summer with his Bachelorette co-star Hannah Brown who is now on Dancing With The Stars.
description:
The Bachelorette's Tyler Cameron is opening about his relationship with supermodel, Gigi Hadid.
'Just meeting someone that was great. She's a great person, and I met a great friend,' he said.
